meanings.definition: The amount that a drawer can hold.
meanings.sent1: I opened the drawer and found a drawerful of socks.
meanings.sent2: The dresser had a drawerful of neatly folded clothes.
meanings.sent3: When I opened the drawer, a drawerful of socks spilled out!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a drawerful of memories, each neatly organized.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was a drawerful of sparkling jewels.

meanings.sent1: The drawerful of papers was difficult to close.
meanings.sent2: She opened the drawerful of art supplies to start her project.
meanings.sent3: The drawerful of toys seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a drawerful of unopened letters, waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The drawerful of secrets was finally revealed during the investigation.
